name: The Missing Piece (Nicole Polidore, ysong)
description:
The Missing Piece is a cooperative action and puzzle game. Inspired by the film My Life as a Zucchini and the game Knights and Bikes, play as four children escaping reality through their imagination. Being victims of an alcoholic mother, these four kids have to find a way through the house, fighting monsters and solving puzzles. 

** This game is an asymmetrical multiplayer. 2-4 players required. 

Team:

You Jin Song: Character Design / Animation, Programmer

Costas Constantinides: Programmer / Concept Designer

Analisse Guadeloupe: Programmer

Nicole Polidore: Level Designer / Environment Design
